actions.command: tellraw @s {"text":"Crystalline movement and extra [Photon Leap] disabled!","color":"dark_red"}
execute at @s at @s run particle flash
execute at @e[type=!#apocalypse:non_living,distance=0.1..16,type=!minecraft:player,tag=!provoked] run particle minecraft:effect ~ ~1 ~ 0 0.5 0 0.01 1 normal @a[tag=refractor]
execute at @e[distance=0.1..16,type=minecraft:player] run particle entity_effect ~ ~1 ~ 0 1 0 1 1 normal @a[tag=refractor]

badges.text: While sneaking, you can eat §5Amethyst§f, §bDiamond§f, §aEmerald§f and §7Quartz§f to change up your passive features, heal for 1 heart and refill your §5[Trapped Light]§f.

§e§lDamage Resistances:§r§f Non-physical (-50%), Lightning (-100%), Falling (-100%, §aEmerald§f form only).
 
§c§lDamage Vulnerabilities:§r§f Explosions & Kinetic Damage (+50%, only while not in §bDiamond§f form), Pickaxes (+100%).
 
§c§lEffect Immunities:§r§f Instant Health, Regeneration, Poison, Hunger.

§5[True Blindness]§f reduces melee damage by 25% and makes all projectile attacks miss.
§5[Trapped Light]§f is generated 10% of the time every half a second.

§5[Crystalline Movement]§f is toggled when you use a Crystalline Emblem while sneaking, granting you the following:
 -[Reflective Jump]: Jump while sliding off a wall or while anchored.
 -[Photon Bounce]: You can attack to bounce off nearby enemies, even if you didn't hit them directly. If this ability is off, you will only bounce if you hit an enemy directly.
 -[Photon Leap]: You can triple jump. Can be toggled independently from the other abilities. If this ability is off, you will double jump instead.

name: Passives
description:
§a[Positive Passives]§r
 - Your max HP is 40, 20 in §bDiamond§r form.
 
- You can mine budding amethyst with silk touch. The resulting block is a deactivated amethyst block which does not grow amethyst clusters.
 
 - You recover health if you stand on a magma block or a budding amethyst block (deactivated amethyst works), or if you are on fire or take fire damage. While in §bDiamond§r form, you can only regain health like this 10 times before overheating, but you can avoid overheating by spending some time outside of fire.
 
 - You inflict §5[True§r §5Blindness]§r for 2 seconds on whoever hits you with a projectile attack.
 
 - You can not be killed in one hit if you are above 35 hp (15 in §bDiamond§r form), you will instead drop to 20 hp (10 in §bDiamond§r form).
 
§4[Negative Passives]§r
 - You can not use potions directly.
 
 - You can not wear armor or wield shields.
 
 - You do not regenerate health naturally 
 
 - You sink like a rock in water.
 
 - Your trapped light generation slows down significantly when not under direct sunlight.
 
§5[Amethyst Passives]§r
 -§5[Kinetic§r §5Resonance]§r: You deal increased damage while falling, 25% +5 for every 5 blocks, up to +30.
 
§b[Diamond Passives]§r
 -§b[Diamond§r §bis§r §bUnbreakable]§r: Your max HP is halved and you overheat when you heal with fire, but you can wear all armor and use shields.
 
§a[Emerald Passives]§r
 -§a[Four§r §aLeaf§r §aGem]§r: You have the Luck II potion effect permanently, your speed increases by 30% and you are immune to fall damage. Eating emeralds refills your trapped light gauge. You generate twice as much §5[Trapped§r §5Light]§r and you are are twice as likely to generate §5[Trapped§r §5Light]§r if it is not guaranteed. You are frail and take double damage from all sources, quadruple if you were already vulnerable to them.
 
§4[Quartz Passives]§r
 -§4[Unstable§r §4Berserker]§r: By attacking while holding your mirror, you reduce the damage you take by 75% for 1 second, extended by 1 second if you get hit. After parrying successfully, you deal 5 more melee damage for every 5 hit points you are missing with your next melee attack and regain 10 hit points. You heal 5 hit points when you kill a creature. You can wear all armor, but gain no armor points or toughness from it, your speed increases by 15%, you deal an additional 12.5% melee damage while airborne and you are immune to fall damage. You are reckless and take four times damage from all sources, or eight times as much if you were already vulnerable to them.
